name: Divine Retribution
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Rosaria, equip this card.
After Rosaria equips this card, immediately use Ravaging Confession once.
When your Rosaria, who has this card equipped, is on the field: Uses Ravaging Confession, or after you generate Strike Where It Hurts, create 1 Changing Shifts card in your Hand. (Once per Round)
(You must have Rosaria in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1113]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1113] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11132]</color> once.
When your $[A1113], who has this card equipped, is on the field: Uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11132]</color>, or after you generate <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111133]</color>, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C332002]</color> card in your Hand. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1113] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rosaria</color>, equip this card.
After Rosaria equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color> once.
When your Rosaria, who has this card equipped, is on the field: Uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Ravaging Confession</color>, or after you generate <color=#FFFFFFFF>Strike Where It Hurts</color>, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Changing Shifts</color> card in your Hand. (Once per Round)
(You must have Rosaria in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Rosaria to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
